summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent late at night. The email contains a brief message with a mention of typos and is marked as confidential. It appears to be part of a larger set of documents related to Epstein's communications.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a personal communication.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, suggesting a relationship with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are engaged in personal correspondence, indicating a social connection.

keyFacts: The email was sent on February 15, 2011.
The email is marked as confidential.
The sender expresses an apology for typos in the message.
